content.question: The presence of the building shown in Source 1 is a legacy of which of the following features of the Mali Empire?

choices.label: Its role as a powerful military empire focused on widespread expansion of its territory
Its position as an imperial power facilitating the spread of learning and culture in the region
Its position as a West African leader in the trade of enslaved people
Its involvement in influencing East African architectural designs

content.answer: Its position as an imperial power facilitating the spread of learning and culture in the region

topic.text: 1.5: The Sudanic Empires: Ghana, Mali, and Songhai

skill.text: 1.C: Identify and explain patterns, connections, or other relationships (causation, changes, continuities, comparison).
